name: Diamond Drone
description:
Dive into the ultimate drone piloting challenge with Diamond Drone! Test the limits of your drone control skills as you navigate through the captivating ruins to collect all the dazzling rubies within the allotted time. Keep a close eye on your battery levels, strategically locate floor-dropped batteries for quick recharges, and master the art of efficient flight.
Diamond Drone offers an immersive experience with versatile controls, accommodating both keyboard and mouse inputs as well as gamepad compatibility. Are you ready to embark on this electrifying drone adventure and prove your mastery of aerial maneuvers?
